title: Can't run the replaceExternalAccess.sh
content:
When you try to run some OMT Tools, such as replaceExternalAccess.sh, you might get the following errors:

cdf chart doesn't exist, so you can not change FQDN

Or

Failed to find CDF_HOME. Please make sure CDF_HOME is in /root/itom-cdf.sh

Cause

From 2021.05, you must enable the Tools capabilities on the bastion node before running any script or tools.

Solution

For how to enable the Tools capabilities, refer to the installation section for external Kubernetes deployments of OMT or the “Enable OMT capabilities Tools on a new bastion node” in the Administer section.
